file_content.text: Didn't I warn you? He's a Rakata agent! He'll murder Hallow Voice if you don't do something!
I warned you. She's an agent for the Rakata! Will you stand there while she murders Hallow Voice?
But no Jedi could-- no. This is over!
I'll be the one who takes your head. Not the others. The First Son will see what Belsavis can do.
At least give me the First Son's name before I die.
Who is the First Son?
You're an insect in the machine; you don't get last requests.
Soon the Esh-kha I've freed, all those loyal to Hallow Voice, will be here.
My army is coming.
Fine. They can all die with their leader.
No point negotiating, I see.
Set emergency condition 292. Respond with lethal force.
You see, Jedi, there's power, and there's control. Without both, you're nothing.
Still alive, Jedi? Nobody escapes Belsavis--or a Child of the Emperor.
I'm no assassin; I'm here to save him.
I'm rescuing Hallow Voice.
You're making a mistake. Commander Geland speaks only lies.
This man is manipulating you.
I don't think they're listening.
When these Esh-kha start thinking rationally again, you won't know what hit you.
They'll turn on you, Geland.
Thanks for the warning. Now die.
So many cameras, Jedi. You can't hide from me. I look forward to seeing your face when you trigger my little surprise.
I said, set emergency condition 292! Respond! Why won't... you. You found the master key, didn't you?
I wish this wasn't necessary. Set emergency condition 292. Lethal force.
I'm sorry, Geland. [Use key.]
Now we duel honorably, no droids or security systems. Unless you'd prefer to surrender.
But I won't use it.
You just threw away your only chance.
Now you understand who's really in charge. Set emergency condition 292. Lethal force.
I'll enjoy this. [Use key.]
You just earned yourself one of these Esh-kha coffins. And a thousand years in the dark.
